name: NSSpeechSynthesizer
desc: The Cocoa interface to speech synthesis in macOS.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The synthesizer’s delegate.

items.name: usesFeedbackWindow
items.desc: Indicates whether the receiver uses the speech feedback window.

items.name: voice
items.desc: Returns the identifier of the receiver’s current voice.

items.name: setVoice
items.desc: Sets the receiver’s current voice.

items.name: rate
items.desc: The synthesizer’s speaking rate (words per minute).

items.name: volume
items.desc: The synthesizer’s speaking volume.

items.name: addSpeechDictionary
items.desc: Registers the given speech dictionary with the receiver.

items.name: object
items.desc: Provides the value of a receiver’s property.

items.name: setObject
items.desc: Specifies the value of a receiver’s property.

items.name: availableVoices
items.desc: Provides the identifiers of the voices available on the system.

items.name: attributes
items.desc: Provides the attribute dictionary of a voice.

items.name: defaultVoice
items.desc: Provides the identifier of the default voice.

items.name: isAnyApplicationSpeaking
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether any application is currently speaking through the sound output device.

items.name: isSpeaking
items.desc: Indicates whether the receiver is currently generating synthesized speech.

items.name: startSpeaking
items.desc: Begins speaking synthesized text through the system’s default sound output device.

items.name: startSpeaking
items.desc: Begins synthesizing text into a sound (AIFF) file.

items.name: pauseSpeaking
items.desc: Pauses synthesis in progress at a given boundary.

items.name: continueSpeaking
items.desc: Resumes synthesis.

items.name: stopSpeaking
items.desc: Stops synthesis in progress.

items.name: stopSpeaking
items.desc: Stops synthesis in progress at a given boundary.

items.name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.Boundary
items.desc: These constants are used to indicate where speech should be stopped and paused. See pauseSpeaking(at:) and stopSpeaking(at:).

items.name: phonemes
items.desc: Provides the phoneme symbols generated by the given text.
